content: Oh a crackers great to have you with me today we're gonna do drums drums in the
deep let's hit the table I'll show you these
cool war drums you can make for your table super cheap super easy the DMS
craft way let's hit it to start the project I
picked up these ornamental decorations from the dollar tree and these are just
drum decorations right they had two different sizes smaller than a larger
and I picked up both packs for a dollar each so check out the Dollar Tree and
pick these up and we'll do a little modification in our table and then paint
them up alright so I have our drum here and I'm using my hot glue gun and I'm
gonna apply some glue to it and the reason I'm doing this is because the top
of the drum is just looks kind of flat so I want to add some texture to it so
I'm just gonna work my glue gun into it and kind of pull out from the center
there and get kind of a nice texture detail there on that on the drum and
I'll just finish this up and then do the other ones and the other side and the
other ones and it'll be ready to go cool now I just need to spray-paint
these flat black with a cheap flat black spray-paint and I'll be ready to paint
up after my black bombing I'm going to use a burnt umber and paint the drum so
cover it all up and let it dry there and now that that's dry I'm going to use a
medium brown and kind of paint the drum itself don't worry if you get it on the
ropes or anything there we go just fill it all in cool easy peasy
all right now I'm going to do the drum tops I'm going to kind of do a wet
golden brown and that'll let some of the brother Brown show through and then I'm
gonna do the ropes with like a tan and so I'll just follow along carefully with
a small detail brush and do the ropes and pretty cool so just go along around
the whole thing the one last thing you want to remember is to do the areas
where the ropes spiral around the top and the bottom that way I won't just
look like the Rope cuts off
we are crafter with our wardrobe I think it works really really neat here we got
a bugbear here with a giant Club banging on the wardroom wow that's just really
cool just such an easy conversion of those cheap Christmas ornaments Wow just
so easy looks great let's look at the bigger one here so when you really want
to get serious and alert the whole lair you bang on this baby it's I just love
these I think these came out so great so let's take a closer look and that
texture detail with the glue gun really helps the flat surface just nice easy
paint job just really brings it to life and there you go some super easy and
cheap war drums for your games boom boom boom hey what are you still
